snippet.title: The Signal State - Official Trailer [PC & Mac]
snippet.description:
Set in a post-apocalyptic future, The Signal State puts your logic skills to the test with complex puzzles inspired by modular synthesizers. Repair machines, rebuild an abandoned farm, and be part of a revolution that will change the fate of agriculture once and for all.

Coming to PC & Mac on 23rd Sep 2021.


--

Wishlist NOW & try the demo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1577620/The_Signal_State/
Come say hi on Twitter: https://twitter.com/thesignalstate
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/wX4gRN6jN4


--
